Name: Candlewick
Author: Carlo Collodi
Notes: Boy who turns into a donkey

Name: Pete
Author: Jackie French
Notes: A sheep that acts like a sheep dog

Name: Giraffe
Work: The Giraffe and the Pelly and Me
Author: Roald Dahl
Notes: Giraffe who works together with a pelican and a monkey as a window cleaner . She describes herself as a Geraneous giraffe who only likes food from a very specific kind of tree

Name: Rudolph
Author: Robert L. May
Notes: A reindeer originally from the 1939 story 'Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer ' , later adapted to a 1949 song , a 1964 television special , and various derivative works

Name: Bambi
Work: Bambi , A Life in the Woods
Author: Felix Salten
Notes: In the Disney films his species was changed to the white-tailed deer , which would be more familiar to American audiences . His image is a Disney icon , comparable to the recognition of Jiminy Cricket or Tinkerbell , and he is even shown on Disney stock certificates

Name: Ferdinand the Bull
Author: Munro Leaf and Robert Lawson
Notes: Peaceful and gentle Ferdinand prefers sniffing flowers to fighting in the arena
